name: Fixes for Bitbucket Dark + Fixes - by Prognoz (dep
description:
Get's rid of the worst issues when installing said theme. Not perfect, but should be better at least. Doesn't look as much as the original, but more like a dark theme in general.

The more original CSS, the smaller the change it breaks soon, I hope. Therefore, I kept the default blue on places like the side bar.
additional_info: Made for personal use and provides as is. I might update stuff as I find it issues that are bothersome to me.

discussions.name: works well for PR code review on Bitbucket
